awe6.interfaces.IAssetManager

type
interface
Provides functions to interact with media assets embedded or loaded in the application.

Use with caution, there are usually more type safe ways to utilise assets.

Instance Methods

getAsset( id : String, ?packageId : String, ?args : Array<Dynamic> ) : Dynamic

parameters
id The uniqie reference of the requested asset. E.g. className.
?packageId The package of the requested asset. Will default to "assets" if not provided.
?args Some assets may require additional arguments, provide them here.
returns
The asset - can be of any type for type inference (or cast as appropriate).
Request an embedded or loaded media asset. E.g. bitmap or sound.
